CustomField.description: If checked, will by default check the Exclude from Billing checkbox on child Expenses, which has the same effect as Billing Hold, but intended to reflect a permanent exclusion from Billing Generation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, will by default check the Exclude from Billing checkbox on child Expenses, which has the same effect as Billing Hold, but intended to reflect a permanent exclusion from Billing Generation.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Billing
